Package server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
Server is a class that allows sending information to the client
Version:
1.0
Author:
Romain DUBUC
